EntrySentence3: Weeks later, one left a message about a question on paperwork.
EntrySentence4: I phoned with: "It's me" and he said horrible things about me.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz1: I was forced to dismiss the employee.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz2: I gave him a raise and a promotion.

EntrySentence1: Hannah had a beautiful cat that she loved very much.
EntrySentence2: However, he noticed that his cat was getting very old.
EntrySentence3: One day, his cat ran away and never came back.
EntrySentence4: Hannah was devastated.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz1: She never saw her beautiful cat again.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz2: He found his cat hiding under the sofa.

EntrySentence1: Larry hasn't eaten all day.
EntrySentence2: He is afraid that he has no food at home to eat.
EntrySentence3: He finally realises that he has instant noodles in his cupboard.
EntrySentence4: Boil water to cook the noodles.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz1: He has noodles for dinner.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz2: Larry orders a pizza.

EntrySentence1: Tim got his first job.
EntrySentence2: But it required him to sit for long hours.
EntrySentence3: Tim wanted to spend the money he earned on a car.
EntrySentence4: Instead, he had to spend it on a back operation.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz1: His back felt much better after the surgery.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz2: Tim decided to buy a boat.

EntrySentence1: Rex has always liked birds.
EntrySentence2: One day his friend recommended that he go bird-watching in a local park.
EntrySentence3: Rex and his friend saw finches, sparrows and other birds.
EntrySentence4: Then they talked about all the birds they had seen having an ice cream.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz1: They had fun.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz2: Rex decided he didn't want to do that again.

EntrySentence1: Tina invited Todd to dinner.
EntrySentence2: He went to the fish market for something special.
EntrySentence3: She was frightened by all the fish eyes staring at her.
EntrySentence4: He left without buying anything.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz1: Tina decided that they would dine out.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz2: That night they had fish for dinner with extra fish eyes.

EntrySentence1: Wallace was passionate about gardening.
EntrySentence2: He has been gardening since he was ten years old.
EntrySentence3: Wallace followed his passion well into university.
EntrySentence4: Wallace graduated from university with a degree in biology.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz1: He used his knowledge to become a professional gardener.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz2: He used his knowledge to become a professional taxi driver.
